text: is a city in Ibaraki, Japan. The city of Bandō is made up of the old city of Iwai and the town of Sashima, which joined on March 22, 2005. == Sister cities== * Pine Bluff, Arkansas United States ==Notable people from Bandō== * Keita Goto, professional footballer * Makoto Takimoto, judoka * Wakanami Jun, sumo wrestler == Other websites == * Official website of Bandō Category:Cities in Ibaraki Prefecture
title: Bandō, Ibaraki
